thread.title: Tom Brady's family wore their own jerseys to Super Bowl LI
thread.title_full: Tom Brady's family wore their own jerseys to Super Bowl LI

author: Sam Laird
title: Tom Brady's family wore their own jerseys to Super Bowl LI
text:
Presented here without comment or judgment: Tom Brady 's family members wore their own jerseys to Super Bowl LI , jerseys which featured the quarterback's personal logo and the slogan "Brady's ladies."
We know this because Brady's wife, the supermodel Gisele B√ºndchen, posted photos of the family fits to Instagram .
We are ready! Let's go @tombrady !! Let's go Pats!!! ‚ú®üèà‚ú®üòòüí´
A photo posted by Gisele B√ºndchen (@gisele) on Feb 5, 2017 at 12:00pm PST
Bom dia! Game day! #superbowl #daddyslittlegirl ‚ú®‚ù§Ô∏è‚ú®üèà
A photo posted by Gisele B√ºndchen (@gisele) on Feb 5, 2017 at 6:03am PST
The New England Patriots quarterback was seeking his fifth Super Bowl ring Sunday. Just another day in the totally normal, totally average life of the modern-day Brady bunch.
A day before the Super Bowl, Brady posted an Instagram photo of himself and his father kissing his mother, Galynn, who has reportedly been battling what CSN New England called "health issues" for about a year and a half now.
Sandwich kiss for Mom at Picture Day!!! Go Pats!!!!
A photo posted by Tom Brady (@tombrady) on Feb 4, 2017 at 4:04pm PST
"Yeah, it‚Äôs personal with my family," Brady told reporters earlier this week. "I‚Äôm just hoping everyone is here on Sunday to share a great experience. It has been a tough year. Every family goes through different things. My family has always been a great support system for me."
Those personalized jerseys show this Super Bowl Sunday was no exception.
